kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default

    matchLabels:

##### FILE: nginx_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to demo/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
    color: green
  name: nginx
  namespace: demo
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
        color: green
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi

---

##### FILE: nginx_affinity.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: region
                operator: In
                values:
                - sa-east-1
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/nginx failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

##### FILE: nginx_antiaffinity.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
      podAntiAffinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: region
                operator: In
                values:
                - sa-east-1

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/nginx

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/nginx
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/nginx failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Deployment/nginx failed:
1 - autogen-require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule autogen-require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/nginx failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/nginx failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/nginx failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource default/Deployment/nginx failed:
1 - autogen-validate-resources validation error: CPU and memory resource requests and memory limits are required for containers. rule autogen-validate-resources failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/resources/

policy require-pod-probes -> resource default/Deployment/nginx failed:
1 - autogen-validate-probes validation failure: Liveness, readiness, or startup probes are required for all containers.

1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/

1 - autogen-validate-registries validation error: Unknown image registry. rule autogen-validate-registries failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/image/

##### FILE: nginx_conf.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nginx-conf:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: |
    user nginx;
    worker_processes auto;
    error_log /var/log/nginx/error.log;
    pid /var/run/nginx.pid;
    events {
        worker_connections 1024;
    }
    http {
        include /etc/nginx/mime.types;
        default_type application/octet-stream;
        log_format main '$remote_addr - $remote_user [$time_local] "$request" '
                          '$status $body_bytes_sent "$http_referer" '
                          '"$http_user_agent" "$http_x_forwarded_for"';
        access_log /var/log/nginx/access.log main;
        sendfile on;
        keepalive_timeout 65;
        include /etc/nginx/conf.d/*.conf;
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: nginx-conf
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: nginx_configMap.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to onepage/ConfigMap/nginx-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  config: "server {\n  index index.php index.html;\n  error_log  /var/log/nginx/error.log;\n
    \ access_log /var/log/nginx/access.log;\n  root /code;\n  \n  location / {\n    try_files
    $uri $uri/ /index.php?$query_string;\n  }\n\n  location ~ \\.php$ {\n    try_files
    $uri =404;\n    fastcgi_split_path_info ^(.+\\.php)(/.+)$;\n    fastcgi_pass onepage:9000;\n
    \   fastcgi_index index.php;\n    include fastcgi_params;\n    fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME
    $document_root$fastcgi_script_name;\n    fastcgi_param PATH_INFO $fastcgi_path_info;\n
    \   fastcgi_buffers 8 32k;\n  }\n\n}\n"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: onepage
  name: nginx-config
  namespace: onepage

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: nginx_configmap1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to three-tier/ConfigMap/nginx-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: |
    worker_processes  1;

    events {
        worker_connections  1024;
    }

    http {
        include       mime.types;
        default_type  application/octet-stream;

        server {
            listen 80;
            server_name _;
            location / {
                proxy_pass http://frontend:3000;
                proxy_http_version 1.1;
                proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;
                proxy_set_header Connection 'upgrade';
                proxy_set_header Host $host;
                proxy_cache_bypass $http_upgrade;
            }
            location /api/task {
                proxy_pass http://api:3500/api/task;
                proxy_http_version 1.1;
                proxy_set_header Upgrade $http_upgrade;
                proxy_set_header Connection 'upgrade';
                proxy_set_header Host $host;
                proxy_cache_bypass $http_upgrade;
            }
        }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: nginx-config
  namespace: three-tier

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: nginx_configmaps.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nginx-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: |
    server {
      listen 80;
      location / {
        root /usr/share/nginx/html;
        index index.html index.htm;
      }
      location /metrics {
        stub_status on;
        access_log off;
      }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: nginx-config
  namespace: default

##### FILE: nginx_dep.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/myapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: myapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp-dep
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: myapp-dep
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /home/auto-reload-nginx.sh
        image: deekshithsn/nginxhttps
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /index.html
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 30
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: myapp-dep
        ports:
        - containerPort: 443
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/ssl
          name: ssl-cert
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d
          name: nginx-files
        - mountPath: /var/log/nginx
          name: logs
      - args:
        - -c
        - cp /root/scripts/syncs3.sh /root/syncs3.sh;chmod 777 /root/syncs3.sh;while
          true; do sh /root/syncs3.sh; sleep 10;done
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        image: xueshanf/awscli
        name: sidecar-logs
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/log/nginx
          name: logs
        - mountPath: /root/.aws/config
          name: aws-credentials
          subPath: config
        - mountPath: /root/scripts/syncs3.sh
          name: aws-credentials
          subPath: syncs3.sh
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - mkdir -p /etc/nginx/ssl;openssl req -newkey rsa:2048 -nodes -keyout /etc/nginx/ssl/nginx.key
          -x509 -days 365 -out /etc/nginx/ssl/nginx.crt -subj '/C=GB/ST=London/L=London/O=Global
          Security/OU=IT Department/CN=example.com'
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        image: deekshithsn/openssl
        name: ssl-cert-creation
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/ssl
          name: ssl-cert
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: ssl-cert
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: logs
      - configMap:
          name: aws-config
        name: aws-credentials
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-files

---

##### FILE: nginx_deploy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to onepage/Deployment/nginx-onepage:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: onepage
  name: nginx-onepage
  namespace: onepage
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
      k8s-app: onepage
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
        k8s-app: onepage
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /code
          name: dir
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d
          name: config
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /code
        name: dir
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: config
            path: site.conf
          name: nginx-config
        name: config

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to three-tier/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: three-tier
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: config-volume
          subPath: nginx.conf
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: html-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-config
        name: config-volume
      - configMap:
          name: html-config
        name: html-volume

##### FILE: nginx_deployment_manifest.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.19.1
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: nginx
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - curl
            - -f
            - http://localhost:80/
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.5
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.25
            memory: 128Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            port: 80
          timeoutSeconds: 5

---

  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
        type: front-end
      name: myapp-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx-container

##### FILE: nginx_deployment2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nginx-conf:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  default.conf: |-
    server {
        listen       500;

        server_name  localhost;

        #charset koi8-r;
        #access_log  /var/log/nginx/host.access.log  main;

        location / {
            root   /usr/share/nginx/html;
            index  index.html index.htm;
        }

        #error_page  404              /404.html;

        # redirect server error pages to the static page /50x.html
        #
        error_page   500 502 503 504  /50x.html;
        location = /50x.html {
            root   /usr/share/nginx/html;
        }

        # proxy the PHP scripts to Apache listening on 127.0.0.1:80
        #
        #location ~ \.php$ {
        #    proxy_pass   http://127.0.0.1;
        #}

        # pass the PHP scripts to FastCGI server listening on 127.0.0.1:9000
        #
        #location ~ \.php$ {
        #    root           html;
        #    fastcgi_pass   127.0.0.1:9000;
        #    fastcgi_index  index.php;
        #    fastcgi_param  SCRIPT_FILENAME  /scripts$fastcgi_script_name;
        #    include        fastcgi_params;
        #}

        # deny access to .htaccess files, if Apache's document root
        # concurs with nginx's one
        #
        #location ~ /\.ht {
        #    deny  all;
        #}
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: nginx-conf
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: nginx_deployment2_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/nginx:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    imagePullPolicy: Always
    name: 1st
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
      name: http
      protocol: TCP
  - image: nginx
    imagePullPolicy: Always
    name: 2nd
    ports:
    - containerPort: 500
      name: http
      protocol: TCP
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
      name: nginx-proxy-config
      subPath: default.conf
  volumes:
  - configMap:
      name: nginx-conf
    name: nginx-proxy-config

---

apiVersion: v1
data:
  default.conf: |-
    server {
        listen       500;

        server_name  localhost;

        #charset koi8-r;
        #access_log  /var/log/nginx/host.access.log  main;

        location / {
            root   /usr/share/nginx/html;
            index  index.html index.htm;
        }

        #error_page  404              /404.html;

        # redirect server error pages to the static page /50x.html
        #
        error_page   500 502 503 504  /50x.html;
        location = /50x.html {
            root   /usr/share/nginx/html;
        }

        # proxy the PHP scripts to Apache listening on 127.0.0.1:80
        #
        #location ~ \.php$ {
        #    proxy_pass   http://127.0.0.1;
        #}

        # pass the PHP scripts to FastCGI server listening on 127.0.0.1:9000
        #
        #location ~ \.php$ {
        #    root           html;
        #    fastcgi_pass   127.0.0.1:9000;
        #    fastcgi_index  index.php;
        #    fastcgi_param  SCRIPT_FILENAME  /scripts$fastcgi_script_name;
        #    include        fastcgi_params;
        #}

        # deny access to .htaccess files, if Apache's document root
        # concurs with nginx's one
        #
        #location ~ /\.ht {
        #    deny  all;
        #}
    }
kind: ConfigMap

  name: nginx-conf
  namespace: default

##### FILE: nginx_deployments.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/port: "9113"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      - args:
        - -nginx.scrape-uri=http://localhost/metrics
        image: nginx/nginx-prometheus-exporter:0.11.0
        name: nginx-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9113
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.3
            memory: 128Mi
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config

---

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno

    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1

  namespace: ingress-nginx

    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"

apiVersion: v1

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

##### FILE: nginx_ingress_controller_14.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/ingress-nginx-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.10.1
  name: ingress-nginx-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.10.1
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --election-id=ingress-nginx-leader
        - --controller-class=k8s.io/ingress-nginx
        - --ingress-class=nginx
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --validating-webhook=:8443
        - --validating-webhook-certificate=/usr/local/certificates/cert
        - --validating-webhook-key=/usr/local/certificates/key
        - --watch-ingress-without-class=true
        - --enable-metrics=false
        - --publish-status-address=localhost
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LD_PRELOAD
          value: /usr/local/lib/libmimalloc.so
        image: registry.k8s.io/ingress-nginx/controller:v1.10.1@sha256:e24f39d3eed6bcc239a56f20098878845f62baa34b9f2be2fd2c38ce9fb0f29e
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /wait-shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          hostPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          hostPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: webhook
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 90Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 101
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/certificates/
          name: webhook-cert
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      nodeSelector:
        ingress-ready: "true"
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 0
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
        operator: Equal
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
        operator: Equal
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-cert
        secret:
          secretName: ingress-nginx-admission

##### FILE: nginx_ingress1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nginx/Ingress/nginx-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/backend-protocol: HTTP
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/group.name: dhruv-alb-grp
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/healthcheck-path: /nginx
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/healthcheck-protocol: HTTP
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/listen-ports: '[{"HTTP":80}]'
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/load-balancer-name: dhruv-ALB
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/scheme: internet-facing
    alb.ingress.kubernetes.io/target-type: ip
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: alb
  name: nginx-ingress
  namespace: nginx
spec:
  ingressClassName: alb
  rules:
  - http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: nginx-svc
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /nginx
        pathType: Prefix

---

##### FILE: nginx_probe.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-not-ready:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-not-ready
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-not-ready
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-not-ready
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders: null
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: nginx
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-not-ready
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-not-ready
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-not-ready
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            httpHeaders: null
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: nginx
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3

##### FILE: nginx_statefulset_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/web:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: web
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  serviceName: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.14.2
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: web
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html/index.html
          name: www
          subPath: index.html
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
      volumes:
      - downwardAPI:
          items:
          - fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
            path: index.html
        name: www

---

kind: StatefulSet

  name: web
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:

  serviceName: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx

      - image: gcr.io/google_containers/nginx-slim:0.8

          name: web

      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 10
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: www
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteMany
      resources:

          storage: 100Mi
      storageClassName: manual

##### FILE: nginx_sts.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/webserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: webserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: webserver
      env: prod
  serviceName: nginx-svc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: webserver
        env: prod
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - nginx
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx-web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: web
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: www
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: www
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 500Mi

##### FILE: nginx357.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dify/ConfigMap/dify-nginx:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: |-
    user  nginx;
    worker_processes  auto;

    error_log  /var/log/nginx/error.log notice;
    pid        /var/run/nginx.pid;


    events {
        worker_connections  1024;
    }


    http {
        include       /etc/nginx/mime.types;
        default_type  application/octet-stream;

        log_format  main  '$remote_addr - $remote_user [$time_local] "$request" '
                          '$status $body_bytes_sent "$http_referer" '
                          '"$http_user_agent" "$http_x_forwarded_for"';

        access_log  /var/log/nginx/access.log  main;

        sendfile        on;
        #tcp_nopush     on;

        keepalive_timeout  65;

        #gzip  on;
        client_max_body_size 15M;

        server {
        listen 80;
        server_name _;

        location /console/api {
          proxy_pass http://api:5001;
          proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
          proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
          proxy_http_version 1.1;
          proxy_set_header Connection "";
          proxy_buffering off;
          proxy_read_timeout 3600s;
          proxy_send_timeout 3600s;
        }

        location /api {
          proxy_pass http://api:5001;
          proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
          proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
          proxy_http_version 1.1;
          proxy_set_header Connection "";
          proxy_buffering off;
          proxy_read_timeout 3600s;
          proxy_send_timeout 3600s;
        }

        location /v1 {
          proxy_pass http://api:5001;
          proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
          proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
          proxy_http_version 1.1;
          proxy_set_header Connection "";
          proxy_buffering off;
          proxy_read_timeout 3600s;
          proxy_send_timeout 3600s;
        }

        location /files {
          proxy_pass http://api:5001;
          proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
          proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
          proxy_http_version 1.1;
          proxy_set_header Connection "";
          proxy_buffering off;
          proxy_read_timeout 3600s;
          proxy_send_timeout 3600s;
        }

        location / {
          proxy_pass http://web:3000;
          proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-For $proxy_add_x_forwarded_for;
          proxy_set_header X-Forwarded-Proto $scheme;
          proxy_http_version 1.1;
          proxy_set_header Connection "";
          proxy_buffering off;
          proxy_read_timeout 3600s;
          proxy_send_timeout 3600s;
        }

        # If you want to support HTTPS, please uncomment the code snippet below
        #listen 443 ssl;
        #ssl_certificate ./../ssl/your_cert_file.cer;
        #ssl_certificate_key ./../ssl/your_cert_key.key;
        #ssl_protocols TLSv1.1 TLSv1.2 TLSv1.3;
        #ssl_prefer_server_ciphers on;
        #ssl_session_cache shared:SSL:10m;
        #ssl_session_timeout 10m;
    }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: dify-nginx
  namespace: dify

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment

  labels:
    app: dify-nginx
  name: dify-nginx
  namespace: dify

  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: dify-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: dify-nginx
    spec:
      automountServiceAccountToken: false
      containers:
      - image: nginx:stable
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: dify-nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: dify-nginx
          subPath: nginx.conf
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d
          name: dify-nginx-config
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: dify-nginx
        name: dify-nginx
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: dify-nginx-config

##### FILE: nginx366.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.24
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nginx
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 32Mi

---

kind: Service

    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: ksrp-expose
  name: nginx
  namespace: default

  ports:
  - port: 80
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 80

    app: nginx
  sessionAffinity: None
  type: ClusterIP

##### FILE: nginx47.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to pingpong/Ingress/pingpong-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$2
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "false"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex: "true"
  name: pingpong-ingress
  namespace: pingpong
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: pingpong.centralindia.cloudapp.azure.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: pingservice
            port:
              number: 8090
        path: /ping(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: Prefix
      - backend:
          service:
            name: pongservice
            port:
              number: 9090
        path: /pong(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: Prefix

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/pi-proxy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    kiamol: ch06
  name: pi-proxy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pi-proxy
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: pi-proxy
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.17-alpine
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/
          name: config
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /data/nginx/cache
          name: cache-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: pi-proxy-configmap
        name: config
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: cache-volume

---

##### FILE: nginx58_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:stable
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http-web-svc
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html/
          name: nginx-index-file
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: index-html-configmap
        name: nginx-index-file

---

##### FILE: nginx69.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nginx/Deployment/nginx-proxy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-proxy
  namespace: nginx
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-proxy
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-proxy
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: ubuntu/nginx:edge
        name: nginx-proxy
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-config-volume
          subPath: nginx.conf
        - mountPath: /etc/ssl/certs/sslcert.pem
          name: nginx-config-volume
          subPath: sslcert.pem
        - mountPath: /etc/ssl/private/sslkey.key
          name: nginx-config-volume
          subPath: sslkey.key
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          items:
          - key: nginx
            path: nginx.conf
          - key: sslcert
            path: sslcert.pem
          - key: sslkey
            path: sslkey.key
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-config-volume

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource nginx/Deployment/nginx-proxy

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource nginx/Deployment/nginx-proxy
policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource nginx/Deployment/nginx-proxy failed:

##### FILE: nginx70.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-conf
          readOnly: true
          subPath: nginx.conf
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: nginx.conf
            path: nginx.conf
          name: nginx-conf
        name: nginx-conf

---

##### FILE: nginx90.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/nginx:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  nginx.conf: "server {\n  listen 80;\n  listen [::]:80;\n  access_log off;\n  root
    /var/www/html;\n  index index.php;\n  server_name example.com;\n  server_tokens
    off;\n  location / {\n    # First attempt to serve request as file, then\n    #
    as directory, then fall back to displaying a 404.\n    try_files $uri $uri/ /index.php?$args;\n
    \ }\n  # pass the PHP scripts to FastCGI server listening on wordpress:9000\n
    \ location ~ \\.php$ {\n    fastcgi_split_path_info ^(.+\\.php)(/.+)$;\n      \n
    \   # Change The Service Name\n    fastcgi_pass phpfpm:9000;\n    fastcgi_index
    index.php;\n    include fastcgi_params;\n    fastcgi_param SCRIPT_FILENAME $document_root$fastcgi_script_name;\n
    \   fastcgi_param SCRIPT_NAME $fastcgi_script_name;\n  }\n}\n"
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  creationTimestamp: null
  name: nginx
  namespace: default

---

##### FILE: nginx91.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
    layer: frontend
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:alpine
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html/
          name: contents
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
          name: nginx-config
          subPath: nginx.conf
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/website
          type: Directory
        name: contents
      - configMap:
          name: nginx
        name: nginx-config

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/debmirror-nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: debmirror
    component: http
  name: debmirror-nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: debmirror
      component: http
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: debmirror
        component: http
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:stable
        name: debian-mirror-nginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 1Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: data
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf
          name: nginx-conf
          subPath: default.conf
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mirror-list
        name: mirror-list
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-conf
        name: nginx-conf
      - hostPath:
          path: /opt/debmirror/data
          type: Directory
        name: data
status: {}

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/myweb-sale:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: myweb-sale
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myweb
      role: project
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: myweb
        role: project
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/maintndjs/web:v1.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: myweb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 150m
            memory: 75Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: tz-seoul
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /usr/share/zoneinfo/Asia/Seoul
        name: tz-seoul

---

##### FILE: nginxlogs.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/tomcat:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: tomcat
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: tomcat
    name: count
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/local/tomcat/logs
      name: varlog
  - command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - |
      while remainsec=$(($(date -d 23:59:59 +%!s(MISSING)) - $(date +%!s(MISSING)) + 1)); log_file=`date +/usr/local/tomcat/logs/catalina.%!Y(MISSING)-%!m(MISSING)-%!d(MISSING).log.txt`;
        if [ -f "$log_file" ];
        then
          tail -n+1 -F $log_file & sleep $remainsec;
        fi
      do
        if [ -f "$log_file" ];
        then
          kill $!;
        fi
      done
    image: busybox
    name: tomcat-log-1
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/local/tomcat/logs
      name: varlog
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: varlog

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/tomcat
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Pod/tomcat failed:
1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

##### FILE: nginxlogs1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/tomcat:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  name: tomcat
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: tomcat
    name: count
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/local/tomcat/logs
      name: varlog
  - command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - |
      while remainsec=$(($(date -d 23:59:59 +%!s(MISSING)) - $(date +%!s(MISSING)) + 1)); log_file=`date +/usr/local/tomcat/logs/catalina.%!Y(MISSING)-%!m(MISSING)-%!d(MISSING).log.txt`;
        if [ -f "$log_file" ];
        then
          tail -n+1 -F $log_file & sleep $remainsec;
        fi
      do
        if [ -f "$log_file" ];
        then
          kill $!;
        fi
      done
    image: busybox
    name: tomcat-log-1
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/local/tomcat/logs
      name: varlog
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: varlog

---

##### FILE: nginxlogs2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/CronJob/nginx-access-logs-cleanup:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: CronJob
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: nginx-access-logs-cleanup
  name: nginx-access-logs-cleanup
  namespace: default
spec:
  jobTemplate:
    spec:
      template:
        metadata:
          annotations:
            cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
          labels:
            app.kubernetes.io/name: nginx-access-logs-cleanup
        spec:
          containers:
          - args:
            - nginx-cleanup-script.sh
            command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            image: nginx:latest
            name: nginx-access-logs-cleanup
            volumeMounts:
            - mountPath: /var/log/nginx
              name: nginx-logs
          restartPolicy: OnFailure
          volumes:
          - emptyDir: {}
            name: nginx-logs
  schedule: 0 0 * * *

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ClusterRole/nginxoperator-editor-role:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: ClusterRole
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: rbac
    app.kubernetes.io/created-by: nginx-operator
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: nginxoperator-editor-role
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kustomize
    app.kubernetes.io/name: clusterrole
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: nginx-operator
  name: nginxoperator-editor-role
  namespace: default
rules:
- apiGroups:
  - operator.example.com
  resources:
  - nginxoperators
  verbs:
  - create
  - delete
  - get
  - list
  - patch
  - update
  - watch
- apiGroups:
  - operator.example.com
  resources:
  - nginxoperators/status
  verbs:
  - get

##### FILE: nginxreplica.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ReplicaSet/app-replicaset:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: ReplicaSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: app-replicaset
  name: app-replicaset
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app-replicaset
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: app-replicaset
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NGX_VERSION
          value: 1.16.1
        image: nginx
        name: app-replicaset
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: web
          protocol: TCP

---

##### FILE: nginxspace-svc.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Service/ingress-nginx:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
  name: ingress-nginx
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  ports:
  - name: http
    port: 80
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 80
  - name: https
    port: 443
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 443
  selector:
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
  type: LoadBalancer

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/nginx:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  annotations:
    cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    run: nginx
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: nginx
    resources: {}
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
      name: htmlvol
  dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
  initContainers:
  - args:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - wget -o /work_dir/index.html https://www.google.com
    image: busybox
    name: busybox
    volumeMounts:
    - mountPath: /work_dir
      name: htmlvol
  restartPolicy: Always
  volumes:
  - emptyDir: {}
    name: htmlvol
status: {}

---

##### FILE: ngix-quit.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/graceful-shutdown-example:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: graceful-shutdown-example
  namespace: default
spec:
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    lifecycle:
      preStop:
        exec:
          command:
          - /bin/sh
          - -c
          - nginx -s quit && sleep 30
    name: sample-container

---

    targetPort: 80

##### FILE: ngnix-ingress.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nginx-ingress/DaemonSet/nginx-ingress:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: nginx-ingress
  namespace: nginx-ingress
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-ingress
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-ingress
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -nginx-configmaps=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/nginx-config
        - -default-server-tls-secret=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/default-server-secret
        - -enable-custom-resources=false
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: nginx/nginx-ingress:2.2.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nginx-ingress
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          hostPort: 80
          name: http
        - containerPort: 443
          hostPort: 443
          name: https
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: readiness-port
        - containerPort: 9113
          name: prometheus
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /nginx-ready
            port: readiness-port
          periodSeconds: 1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsUser: 101
      serviceAccountName: nginx-ingress

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource nginx-ingress/DaemonSet/nginx-ingress

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource nginx-ingress/DaemonSet/nginx-ingress

1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource nginx-ingress/DaemonSet/nginx-ingress failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-requests-limits -> resource nginx-ingress/DaemonSet/nginx-ingress failed:

##### FILE: ngnix-ingress1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nginx-ingress/Deployment/nginx-ingress:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-ingress
  namespace: nginx-ingress
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-ingress
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-ingress
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -nginx-configmaps=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/nginx-config
        - -default-server-tls-secret=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/default-server-secret
        - -enable-custom-resources=false
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: nginx/nginx-ingress:2.2.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nginx-ingress
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: readiness-port
        - containerPort: 9113
          name: prometheus
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /nginx-ready
            port: readiness-port
          periodSeconds: 1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 101
      serviceAccountName: nginx-ingress

---

##### FILE: ngnix-ingress3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nginx-ingress/Deployment/nginx-ingress:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-ingress
  namespace: nginx-ingress
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-ingress
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-ingress
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -nginx-configmaps=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/nginx-config
        - -default-server-tls-secret=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/default-server-secret
        - -enable-custom-resources=false
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        image: nginx/nginx-ingress:2.2.2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nginx-ingress
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
        - containerPort: 8081
          name: readiness-port
        - containerPort: 9113
          name: prometheus
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /nginx-ready
            port: readiness-port
          periodSeconds: 1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 101
      serviceAccountName: nginx-ingress

---

##### FILE: nifi-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nifi:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations: {}
  labels:
    app: nifi
  name: nifi
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nifi
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nifi
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: TZ
          value: Europe/Istanbul
        - name: NIFI_JVM_HEAP_INIT
          value: 4096m
        - name: NIFI_JVM_HEAP_MAX
          value: 4096m
        image: apache/nifi:1.19.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nifi1
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: nifi-https
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 4Gi
          requests:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 3Gi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/nifi/nifi-current/conf
          name: nifi-data
          subPath: nifi1-conf
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: nifi-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: nifi-data-claim
status: {}

---

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Deployment/nifi failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Deployment/nifi failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource default/Deployment/nifi failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

##### FILE: nix-daemon.ds.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to nix-system/DaemonSet/nix-daemon:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: nix-daemon
  name: nix-daemon
  namespace: nix-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: nix-daemon
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        name: nix-daemon
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - |-
          set -xeEuo pipefail
          nix daemon --force-trusted
        command:
        - /usr/bin/env
        - bash
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: nix-daemon-env
        - secretRef:
            name: nix-daemon-env
        image: docker.io/nixos/nix
        name: nix-daemon
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 128Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nix
          name: etc-nix
        - mountPath: /nix
          mountPropagation: HostToContainer
          name: host-nix
      - args:
        - -c
        - |-
          set -xeEuo pipefail
          while nix-store --repair --verify --check-contents ; do
            sleep $(( 3 * 60 * 60 + RANDOM %!((MISSING)15 * 60) ))
          done
        command:
        - /usr/bin/env
        - bash
        envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: nix-client-env
        - secretRef:
            name: nix-client-env
        image: docker.io/nixos/nix
        name: nix-store-repair
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 32Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nix
          name: etc-nix
        - mountPath: /nix/store
          name: host-nix
          readOnly: true
          subPath: store/
        - mountPath: /nix/var/nix/daemon-socket
          name: host-nix
          subPath: var/nix/daemon-socket/
      initContainers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - |-
          set -xeEuo pipefail
          # contains leftovers from the original container
          for dir in /host/nix/var/nix/{gcroots,profiles,temproots} ; do
            test -e "${dir}" || continue
            rm -r "${dir}"
          done
          cp -aT --update=older /nix /host/nix
        command:
        - /usr/bin/env
        - bash
        image: docker.io/nixos/nix
        name: nix-init
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 64Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 8Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host/nix
          name: host-nix
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - name: etc-nix
        projected:
          sources:
          - configMap:
              name: nix-files
          - secret:
              name: nix-files
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/nix
        name: host-nix

---

              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

##### FILE: node-1_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to chain-master/Deployment/nodex:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nodex
  name: nodex
  namespace: chain-master
spec:
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 10
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nodex
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: nodex
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - nodex
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - args:
        - --disable-ssl
        - --mining-difficulty=2
        - --ip=0.0.0.0
        - --port=8080
        - --bootstrap-ip=0.0.0.0
        - --bootstrap-port=8080
        - --bootstrap-account=0x9049b2dcdb126e3003eff55f23bc3d7f570ce0e3
        - --miner=0x9049b2dcdb126e3003eff55f23bc3d7f570ce0e3
        - --datadir=/opt/tbb/data
        image: ccr.ccs.tencentyun.com/superproj/tbb:v0.0.2
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: nodex
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-insecure
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/tbb/data
          name: nodex-database
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 5
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /data/nodex-database
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: nodex-database

---

##### FILE: node-affinity.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/app-disk:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: app-disk
  name: app-disk
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app-disk
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: app-disk
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - preference:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: type
                operator: In
                values:
                - ssd
            weight: 1
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: zone
                operator: In
                values:
                - us-east
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - app-disk
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: app-disk

---

kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx-affinity-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  affinity:
    nodeAffinity:
      requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
        nodeSelectorTerms:
        - matchExpressions:
          - key: disktype
            operator: In
            values:
            - ssd
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: nginx

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/nginx-affinity-pod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: nginx-affinity-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  affinity:
    nodeAffinity:
      preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
      - preference:
          matchExpressions:
          - key: color
            operator: In
            values:
            - yellow
        weight: 1
      - preference:
          matchExpressions:
          - key: disktype
            operator: In
            values:
            - ssd
        weight: 50
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: nginx

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/my-pod:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    color: red
  name: my-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  affinity:
    nodeAffinity:
      requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
        nodeSelectorTerms:
        - key: size
          operator: In
          values:
          - large
          - medium
  containers:
  - image: httpd
    name: web-server
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
      name: web-port
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 128Mi
        memory: 500m

---

##### FILE: node-affinity20.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/node-affinity:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: node-affinity
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: node-affinity
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: node-affinity
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - preference:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: team
                operator: In
                values:
                - engineering-project1
            weight: 1
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: env
                operator: In
                values:
                - dev
      containers:
      - image: wardviaene/k8s-demo
        name: k8s-demo
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
          name: nodejs-port

---

##### FILE: node-affinity22.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - blue
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.7.9
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/nginx-deployment

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/nginx-deployment
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/nginx-deployment failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/pod-node-affinity:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: pod-node-affinity
  namespace: default
spec:
  affinity:
    nodeAffinity:
      requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
        nodeSelectorTerms:
        - matchExpressions:
          - key: kubernetes.io/hostname
            operator: Exists
  containers:
  - command:
    - sleep
    - "3600"
    image: busybox
    name: pod-node-affinity-container

##### FILE: node-affinity3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/app-disk:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: app-disk
  name: app-disk
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app-disk
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: app-disk
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - preference:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: type
                operator: In
                values:
                - ssd
            weight: 1
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: zone
                operator: In
                values:
                - us-east
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - app-disk
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: app-disk

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nottaint2:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nottaint2
  name: nottaint2
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nottaint2
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nottaint2
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: perf
                operator: In
                values:
                - high1
                - high2
      containers:
      - image: sreeharshav/rollingupdate:v5
        name: rollingupdate
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoExecute
        key: project
        operator: Equal
        value: phoenix

---

##### FILE: node-affinity9_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx02:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    PERF: HIGH
  name: nginx02
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 30
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      PERF: HIGH
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        PERF: HIGH
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - preference:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: PERF
                operator: In
                values:
                - HIGH
            weight: 1
      containers:
      - image: sreeharshav/rollingupdate:v5
        name: rollingupdate

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/with-node-affinity:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: with-node-affinity
  namespace: default
spec:
  affinity:
    nodeAffinity:
      preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
      - preference:
          matchExpressions:
          - key: mynode
            operator: In
            values:
            - worker-3
        weight: 1
  containers:
  - image: nginx
    name: nginx

---

##### FILE: node-affinity-required.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/nginx-test:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    app: webapp
    type: front-end
  name: nginx-test
  namespace: default
spec:
  affinity:
    nodeAffinity:
      requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
        nodeSelectorTerms:
        - matchExpressions:
          - key: size
            operator: In
            values:
            - medium
            - small
  containers:
  - image: nginx:latest
    name: nginx

---

##### FILE: node-affinity-todo.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/with-node-affinity:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: with-node-affinity
  namespace: default
spec:
  affinity:
    nodeAffinity:
      preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
      - preference:
          matchExpressions:
          - key: mynode
            operator: In
            values:
            - worker-3
        weight: 1
      requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
        nodeSelectorTerms:
        - matchExpressions:
          - key: mynode
            operator: In
            values:
            - worker-1
  containers:
  - image: ajeetraina/todo:4.5
    name: todo-container

---

##### FILE: node-affinity-with-toleration.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Pod/my-app:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    tier: first
  name: my-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  affinity:
    nodeAffinity:
      requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
        nodeSelectorTerms:
        - key: size
          operator: In
          values:
          - large
  containers:
  - image: httpd
    name: webapp
    ports:
    - containerPort: 80
      name: web-port
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: 500m
        memory: 128Mi
  tolerations:
  - effect: NoSchedule
    key: color
    operator: Equal
    value: red

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/my-app

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Pod/my-app
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Pod/my-app failed:
1 - validate-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed. rule validate-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

policy disallow-latest-tag -> resource default/Pod/my-app failed:
1 - require-image-tag validation failure: validation error: An image tag is required. rule require-image-tag failed at path /image/

policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource default/Pod/my-app failed:
1 - require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/Pod/my-app failed:
1 - require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

##### FILE: node-anti-affinity.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/prodtestdeploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: prodtestdeploy
  name: prodtestdeploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: prodtestdeploy
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: prodtestdeploy
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: PERF
                operator: NotIn
                values:
                - HIGH
      containers:
      - image: sreeharshav/rollingupdate:v1
        name: rollingupdate
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: ENV
        operator: Equal
        value: PROD

---

    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
  name: zodemo-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: node-app
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /node-app
        pathType: Prefix

  name: node-app-one-deployment
  namespace: default

            port: 8080

          periodSeconds: 3

        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /api1
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3

##### FILE: node-backend-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/node-backend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: node-backend
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: node-backend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: node-backend
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - react-frontend
                - mongo
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_URL
          value: mongodb://mongo:27017/quotesdb
        image: chlupnoha/node-backend:latest
        name: node-backend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000

---


Mutation:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/RoleBinding/gce:podsecuritypolicy:nodes:
apiVersion: rbac.authorization.k8s.io/v1
kind: RoleBinding
metadata:
  annotations:
    kubernetes.io/description: Allow nodes to create privileged pods. Should be used
      in combination with the NodeRestriction admission plugin to limit nodes to mirror
      pods bound to themselves.
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
  name: gce:podsecuritypolicy:nodes
  namespace: kube-system
roleRef:
  apiGroup: rbac.authorization.k8s.io
  kind: ClusterRole
  name: gce:podsecuritypolicy:privileged
subjects:
- apiGroup: rbac.authorization.k8s.io
  kind: Group
  name: system:nodes
- apiGroup: rbac.authorization.k8s.io
  kind: User
  name: kubelet

  generateName: node-churn-
  namespace: default
status:
  capacity:
    pods: "0"
  conditions:
  - status: "True"
    type: Ready
  phase: Running

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/node-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: node-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: node-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: node-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: REDIS_URL
          value: redis://redis-main-service.default.svc.cluster.local:6379
        - name: REDIS_REPLICAS_URL
          value: redis://redis-replica-service.default.svc.cluster.local:6379
        - name: PORT
          value: "3000"
        image: riadflh/node-app-img:latest
        name: node-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
