policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/node-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: node-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: node-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: node-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: node-config
        - secretRef:
            name: node-secret
        image: thesumit67/node-app-image:v2
        name: node-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8888
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/node:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: node
  name: node
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: node
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: node
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NODE_ENV
          value: development
        - name: PORT
          value: "3000"
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: user
              name: postgres-credentials
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: postgres-credentials
        image: mwinel/node-kubernetes-web:latest
        name: node
      restartPolicy: Always

##### FILE: node-driver.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/exoscale-csi-node:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels: null
  name: exoscale-csi-node
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: exoscale-csi-node
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: exoscale-csi-node
        role: csi
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --endpoint=$(CSI_ENDPOINT)
        - --v=4
        - --mode=node
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: unix:///csi/csi.sock
        image: exoscale/csi-driver:0.29.6
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 2
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        name: exoscale-csi-plugin
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9808
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 400m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: plugin-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: kubelet-dir
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: device-dir
      - args:
        - --v=2
        - --csi-address=$(CSI_ADDRESS)
        - --kubelet-registration-path=$(KUBELET_REGISTRATION_PATH)
        env:
        - name: CSI_ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBELET_REGISTRATION_PATH
          value: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi.exoscale.com/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.9.0
        name: csi-node-driver-registrar
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi/
          name: plugin-dir
        - mountPath: /registration/
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(CSI_ADDRESS)
        env:
        - name: CSI_ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/livenessprobe:v2.11.0
        name: liveness-probe
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: plugin-dir
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      priorityClassName: system-node-critical
      serviceAccount: exoscale-csi-node
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry/
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: registration-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi.exoscale.com
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: plugin-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet
          type: Directory
        name: kubelet-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
        name: device-dir

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/exoscale-csi-node
policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/exoscale-csi-node failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource kube-system/DaemonSet/exoscale-csi-node failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/exoscale-csi-node:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels: null
  name: exoscale-csi-node
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: exoscale-csi-node
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: exoscale-csi-node
        role: csi
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --endpoint=$(CSI_ENDPOINT)
        - --v=4
        - --mode=node
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: unix:///csi/csi.sock
        image: exoscale/csi-driver:0.31.0
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 2
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        name: exoscale-csi-plugin
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9808
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 400m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: plugin-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: kubelet-dir
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: device-dir
      - args:
        - --v=2
        - --csi-address=$(CSI_ADDRESS)
        - --kubelet-registration-path=$(KUBELET_REGISTRATION_PATH)
        env:
        - name: CSI_ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBELET_REGISTRATION_PATH
          value: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi.exoscale.com/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.9.0
        name: csi-node-driver-registrar
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi/
          name: plugin-dir
        - mountPath: /registration/
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(CSI_ADDRESS)
        env:
        - name: CSI_ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/livenessprobe:v2.11.0
        name: liveness-probe
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: plugin-dir
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      priorityClassName: system-node-critical
      serviceAccount: exoscale-csi-node
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry/
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: registration-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi.exoscale.com
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: plugin-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet
          type: Directory
        name: kubelet-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
        name: device-dir

kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels: null
  name: exoscale-csi-node
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: exoscale-csi-node
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: exoscale-csi-node
        role: csi
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --endpoint=$(CSI_ENDPOINT)
        - --v=4
        - --mode=node
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: unix:///csi/csi.sock
        image: exoscale/csi-driver:0.31.1
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 2
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        name: exoscale-csi-plugin
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9808
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 400m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: plugin-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: kubelet-dir
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: device-dir
      - args:
        - --v=2
        - --csi-address=$(CSI_ADDRESS)
        - --kubelet-registration-path=$(KUBELET_REGISTRATION_PATH)
        env:
        - name: CSI_ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBELET_REGISTRATION_PATH
          value: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi.exoscale.com/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.9.0
        name: csi-node-driver-registrar
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi/
          name: plugin-dir
        - mountPath: /registration/
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(CSI_ADDRESS)
        env:
        - name: CSI_ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/livenessprobe:v2.11.0
        name: liveness-probe
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: plugin-dir
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      priorityClassName: system-node-critical
      serviceAccount: exoscale-csi-node
      tolerations:
      - operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry/
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: registration-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi.exoscale.com
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: plugin-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet
          type: Directory
        name: kubelet-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
        name: device-dir

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/exoscale-csi-node:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels: null
  name: exoscale-csi-node
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: exoscale-csi-node
  template:

      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: exoscale-csi-node

    spec:

        - --mode=node
        env:

          value: unix:///csi/csi.sock

        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 2
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        name: exoscale-csi-plugin
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9808
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP

            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi

            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName

            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi

  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: exoscale-csi-node
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: exoscale-csi-node
        role: csi
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --endpoint=$(CSI_ENDPOINT)
        - --v=4
        - --mode=node
        env:
        - name: CSI_ENDPOINT
          value: unix:///csi/csi.sock
        envFrom:
        - secretRef:
            name: exoscale-credentials
        image: exoscale/csi-driver:0.31.3
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: healthz
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 2
          timeoutSeconds: 3
        name: exoscale-csi-plugin
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9808
          name: healthz
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 400m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: plugin-dir
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet
          mountPropagation: Bidirectional
          name: kubelet-dir
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: device-dir
      - args:
        - --v=2
        - --csi-address=$(CSI_ADDRESS)
        - --kubelet-registration-path=$(KUBELET_REGISTRATION_PATH)
        env:
        - name: CSI_ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        - name: KUBELET_REGISTRATION_PATH
          value: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi.exoscale.com/csi.sock
        - name: KUBE_NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/csi-node-driver-registrar:v2.9.0
        name: csi-node-driver-registrar
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi/
          name: plugin-dir
        - mountPath: /registration/
          name: registration-dir
      - args:
        - --csi-address=$(CSI_ADDRESS)
        env:
        - name: CSI_ADDRESS
          value: /csi/csi.sock
        image: registry.k8s.io/sig-storage/livenessprobe:v2.11.0
        name: liveness-probe
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /csi
          name: plugin-dir
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      priorityClassName: system-node-critical
      serviceAccount: exoscale-csi-node
      tolerations:
      - operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins_registry/
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: registration-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet/plugins/csi.exoscale.com
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: plugin-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet
          type: Directory
        name: kubelet-dir
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
        name: device-dir

---

##### FILE: node-exporter10.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/DaemonSet/node-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    k8s-app: node-exporter
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
    version: v0.15.2
  name: node-exporter
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: node-exporter
      version: v0.18.1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: node-exporter
        prometheus: cluster-monitoring
        version: v0.18.1
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --path.procfs=/host/proc
        - --path.sysfs=/host/sys
        image: prom/node-exporter:v0.18.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: prometheus-node-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9100
          hostPort: 9100
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host/proc
          name: proc
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /host/sys
          name: sys
          readOnly: true
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /proc
        name: proc
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys
  updateStrategy:
    type: OnDelete

---

##### FILE: node-exporter12.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/DaemonSet/node-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: node-exporter
  name: node-exporter
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: node-exporter
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: node-exporter
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: node-exporter-config
        image: registry.cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/orionbonnie/node_exporter:v1
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9100
        name: node-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9100
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 200M
          requests:
            cpu: 150m
            memory: 200M
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 65534
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /metrics/procfs
          name: proc
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev
        - mountPath: /metrics/sysfs
          name: sys
        - mountPath: /metrics/rootfs
          mountPropagation: HostToContainer
          name: root
          readOnly: true
      hostIPC: true
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /proc
        name: proc
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
        name: dev
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: root

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource monitoring/DaemonSet/node-exporter
policy drop-all-capabilities -> resource monitoring/DaemonSet/node-exporter failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource monitoring/DaemonSet/node-exporter failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

policy require-labels -> resource monitoring/DaemonSet/node-exporter failed:
1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

policy require-ro-rootfs -> resource monitoring/DaemonSet/node-exporter failed:
1 - autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem validation error: Root filesystem must be read-only. rule autogen-validate-readOnlyRootFilesystem failed at path /spec/template/spec/containers/0/securityContext/readOnlyRootFilesystem/

policy restrict-image-registries -> resource monitoring/DaemonSet/node-exporter failed:

##### FILE: node-exporter2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/DaemonSet/node-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    k8s-app: node-exporter
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
    version: v0.15.2
  name: node-exporter
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: node-exporter
      version: v0.18.1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: node-exporter
        prometheus: cluster-monitoring
        version: v0.18.1
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --path.procfs=/host/proc
        - --path.sysfs=/host/sys
        image: prom/node-exporter:v0.18.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: prometheus-node-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9100
          hostPort: 9100
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host/proc
          name: proc
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /host/sys
          name: sys
          readOnly: true
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /proc
        name: proc
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys
  updateStrategy:
    type: OnDelete

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

policy drop-cap-net-raw -> resource default/DaemonSet/node-exporter failed:
1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

##### FILE: node-exporter20_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/DaemonSet/node-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: node-exporter
  name: node-exporter
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: node-exporter
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: node-exporter
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --web.listen-address=127.0.0.1:9100
        - --collector.systemd
        - --collector.processes
        - --path.procfs=/host/proc
        - --path.sysfs=/host/sys
        - --path.rootfs=/host/root
        - --no-collector.wifi
        - --no-collector.hwmon
        - --collector.filesystem.ignored-mount-points=^/(dev|proc|sys|var/lib/docker/.+)($|/)
        - --collector.filesystem.ignored-fs-types=^(autofs|binfmt_misc|cgroup|configfs|debugfs|devpts|devtmpfs|fusectl|hugetlbfs|mqueue|overlay|proc|procfs|pstore|rpc_pipefs|securityfs|sysfs|tracefs)$
        image: quay.io/prometheus/node-exporter:v0.18.1
        name: node-exporter
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 180Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 102m
            memory: 180Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host/proc
          name: proc
          readOnly: false
        - mountPath: /host/sys
          name: sys
          readOnly: false
        - mountPath: /host/root
          mountPropagation: HostToContainer
          name: root
          readOnly: true
      - args:
        - --logtostderr
        - --secure-listen-address=[$(IP)]:9100
        - --tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:9100/
        env:
        - name: IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: quay.io/coreos/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.4.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9100
          hostPort: 9100
          name: https
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 40Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
      serviceAccountName: node-exporter
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /proc
        name: proc
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: root

---

    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile

    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
    version: v0.15.2
  name: node-exporter
  namespace: default

    matchLabels:

  template:

      labels:
        k8s-app: node-exporter
        prometheus: cluster-monitoring
        version: v0.18.1
    spec:

        - --path.sysfs=/host/sys

          hostPort: 9100

            memory: 50Mi

      volumes:

        name: proc
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/DaemonSet/node-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile

    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
    version: v0.15.2

spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: node-exporter
      version: v0.18.1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: node-exporter
        prometheus: cluster-monitoring
        version: v0.18.1
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --path.procfs=/host/proc
        - --path.sysfs=/host/sys
        image: prom/node-exporter:v0.18.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: prometheus-node-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9100
          hostPort: 9100
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host/proc
          name: proc
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /host/sys
          name: sys
          readOnly: true
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /proc
        name: proc
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys
  updateStrategy:
    type: OnDelete

---

##### FILE: node-exporter27_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/DaemonSet/node-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: node-exporter
  name: node-exporter
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: node-exporter
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: node-exporter
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --web.listen-address=127.0.0.1:9100
        - --collector.systemd
        - --collector.processes
        - --path.procfs=/host/proc
        - --path.sysfs=/host/sys
        - --path.rootfs=/host/root
        - --no-collector.wifi
        - --no-collector.hwmon
        - --collector.filesystem.ignored-mount-points=^/(dev|proc|sys|var/lib/docker/.+)($|/)
        - --collector.filesystem.ignored-fs-types=^(autofs|binfmt_misc|cgroup|configfs|debugfs|devpts|devtmpfs|fusectl|hugetlbfs|mqueue|overlay|proc|procfs|pstore|rpc_pipefs|securityfs|sysfs|tracefs)$
        image: quay.io/prometheus/node-exporter:v0.18.1
        name: node-exporter
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 180Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 102m
            memory: 180Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host/proc
          name: proc
          readOnly: false
        - mountPath: /host/sys
          name: sys
          readOnly: false
        - mountPath: /host/root
          mountPropagation: HostToContainer
          name: root
          readOnly: true
      - args:
        - --logtostderr
        - --secure-listen-address=[$(IP)]:9100
        - --tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_CBC_SHA256
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:9100/
        env:
        - name: IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: quay.io/coreos/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.4.1
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9100
          hostPort: 9100
          name: https
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 40Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
      serviceAccountName: node-exporter
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /proc
        name: proc
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: root

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/DaemonSet/node-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    addonmanager.kubernetes.io/mode: Reconcile
    k8s-app: node-exporter
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
    version: v0.15.2
  name: node-exporter
  namespace: default

  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: node-exporter
      version: v0.18.1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: node-exporter
        prometheus: cluster-monitoring
        version: v0.18.1
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --path.procfs=/host/proc
        - --path.sysfs=/host/sys
        image: prom/node-exporter:v0.18.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: prometheus-node-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9100
          hostPort: 9100
          name: metrics
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
        volumeMounts:

##### FILE: node-exporter34.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/DaemonSet/node-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: node-exporter
  name: node-exporter
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: node-exporter
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: node-exporter
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --path.sysfs=/host/sys
        - --path.rootfs=/host/root
        - --no-collector.wifi
        - --no-collector.hwmon
        - --collector.filesystem.ignored-mount-points=^/(dev|proc|sys|var/lib/docker/.+|var/lib/kubelet/pods/.+)($|/)
        - --collector.netclass.ignored-devices=^(veth.*)$
        image: prom/node-exporter
        name: node-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9100
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 180Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 102m
            memory: 180Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host/sys
          mountPropagation: HostToContainer
          name: sys
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /host/root
          mountPropagation: HostToContainer
          name: root
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: root

---

##### FILE: node-exporter4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/DaemonSet/node-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: node-exporter
  name: node-exporter
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: node-exporter
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: node-exporter
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: node-exporter-config
        image: registry.cn-guangzhou.aliyuncs.com/orionbonnie/node_exporter:v1
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 9100
        name: node-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9100
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 200M
          requests:
            cpu: 150m
            memory: 200M
        securityContext:
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 65534
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /metrics/procfs
          name: proc
        - mountPath: /dev
          name: dev
        - mountPath: /metrics/sysfs
          name: sys
        - mountPath: /metrics/rootfs
          mountPropagation: HostToContainer
          name: root
          readOnly: true
      hostIPC: true
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /proc
        name: proc
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
        name: dev
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: root

---

##### FILE: node-exporter45.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/DaemonSet/node-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: node-exporter
  name: node-exporter
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: node-exporter
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: node-exporter
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --web.listen-address=0.0.0.0:9100
        - --path.procfs=/host/proc
        - --path.sysfs=/host/sys
        image: quay.io/prometheus/node-exporter:v0.18.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: node-exporter
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 30Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host/proc
          name: proc
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /host/sys
          name: sys
          readOnly: true
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      restartPolicy: Always
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /proc
          type: ""
        name: proc
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
          type: ""
        name: sys

        name: proc
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys

##### FILE: node-exporter58_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/DaemonSet/node-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: node-exporter
  name: node-exporter
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: node-exporter
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: node-exporter
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --path.procfs=/host/proc
        - --path.sysfs=/host/sys
        - --path.rootfs=/host
        image: prom/node-exporter:v1.7.0
        name: node-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9100
          name: metrics
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host/dev
          name: dev
        - mountPath: /host/proc
          name: proc
        - mountPath: /host/sys
          name: sys
        - mountPath: /host
          name: rootfs
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      tolerations:
      - operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /dev
        name: dev
      - hostPath:
          path: /proc
        name: proc
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: rootfs

##### FILE: node-exporter-daemonset1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/DaemonSet/node-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
    app.kubernetes.io/name: node-exporter
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-prometheus
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.2.2
  name: node-exporter
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
      app.kubernetes.io/name: node-exporter
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-prometheus
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
        app.kubernetes.io/name: node-exporter
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-prometheus
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.2.2
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --web.listen-address=127.0.0.1:9100
        - --path.sysfs=/host/sys
        - --path.rootfs=/host/root
        - --no-collector.wifi
        - --no-collector.hwmon
        - --collector.filesystem.ignored-mount-points=^/(dev|proc|sys|var/lib/docker/.+|var/lib/kubelet/pods/.+)($|/)
        - --collector.netclass.ignored-devices=^(veth.*|[a-f0-9]{15})$
        - --collector.netdev.device-exclude=^(veth.*|[a-f0-9]{15})$
        image: quay.io/prometheus/node-exporter:v1.2.2
        name: node-exporter
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 180Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 102m
            memory: 180Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host/sys
          mountPropagation: HostToContainer
          name: sys
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /host/root
          mountPropagation: HostToContainer
          name: root
          readOnly: true
      - args:
        - --logtostderr
        - --secure-listen-address=[$(IP)]:9100
        - --tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:9100/
        env:
        - name: IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: quay.io/brancz/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.11.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9100
          hostPort: 9100
          name: https
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 40Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          runAsGroup: 65532
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 65532
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
      serviceAccountName: node-exporter
      tolerations:
      - operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: root
  updateStrategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 10%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate

##### FILE: node-exporter-daemonset12.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/DaemonSet/node-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
    app.kubernetes.io/name: node-exporter
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-prometheus
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.2.2
  name: node-exporter
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
      app.kubernetes.io/name: node-exporter
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-prometheus
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
        app.kubernetes.io/name: node-exporter
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-prometheus
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.2.2
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --web.listen-address=127.0.0.1:9100
        - --path.sysfs=/host/sys
        - --path.rootfs=/host/root
        - --no-collector.wifi
        - --no-collector.hwmon
        - --collector.filesystem.ignored-mount-points=^/(dev|proc|sys|var/lib/docker/.+|var/lib/kubelet/pods/.+)($|/)
        - --collector.netclass.ignored-devices=^(veth.*|[a-f0-9]{15})$
        - --collector.netdev.device-exclude=^(veth.*|[a-f0-9]{15})$
        image: quay.io/prometheus/node-exporter:v1.2.2
        name: node-exporter
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 180Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 102m
            memory: 180Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host/sys
          mountPropagation: HostToContainer
          name: sys
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /host/root
          mountPropagation: HostToContainer
          name: root
          readOnly: true
      - args:
        - --logtostderr
        - --secure-listen-address=[$(IP)]:9100
        - --tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:9100/
        env:
        - name: IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: quay.io/brancz/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.11.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9100
          hostPort: 9100
          name: https
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 40Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          runAsGroup: 65532
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 65532
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
      serviceAccountName: node-exporter
      tolerations:
      - operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: root
  updateStrategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 10%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate

1 - autogen-check-for-labels validation error: The label `app.kubernetes.io/name` is required. rule autogen-check-for-labels failed at path /spec/template/metadata/labels/app.kubernetes.io/name/

##### FILE: node-exporter-daemonset20.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/DaemonSet/node-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
    app.kubernetes.io/name: node-exporter
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-prometheus
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.2.2
  name: node-exporter
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
      app.kubernetes.io/name: node-exporter
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-prometheus
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
        app.kubernetes.io/name: node-exporter
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-prometheus
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.2.2
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --web.listen-address=127.0.0.1:9100
        - --path.sysfs=/host/sys
        - --path.rootfs=/host/root
        - --no-collector.wifi
        - --no-collector.hwmon
        - --collector.filesystem.ignored-mount-points=^/(dev|proc|sys|var/lib/docker/.+|var/lib/kubelet/pods/.+)($|/)
        - --collector.netclass.ignored-devices=^(veth.*|[a-f0-9]{15})$
        - --collector.netdev.device-exclude=^(veth.*|[a-f0-9]{15})$
        image: quay.io/prometheus/node-exporter:v1.2.2
        name: node-exporter
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 180Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 102m
            memory: 180Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host/sys
          mountPropagation: HostToContainer
          name: sys
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /host/root
          mountPropagation: HostToContainer
          name: root
          readOnly: true
      - args:
        - --logtostderr
        - --secure-listen-address=[$(IP)]:9100
        - --tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:9100/
        env:
        - name: IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: quay.io/brancz/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.11.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9100
          hostPort: 9100
          name: https
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 40Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          runAsGroup: 65532
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 65532
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
      serviceAccountName: node-exporter
      tolerations:
      - operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: root
  updateStrategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 10%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate

---

##### FILE: node-exporter-daemonset21.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/DaemonSet/node-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  name: node-exporter
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: node-exporter
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: node-exporter
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: prom/node-exporter:latest
        name: node-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9100
          hostPort: 9100
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host/proc
          name: proc
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /host/sys
          name: sys
          readOnly: true
      hostNetwork: true
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /proc
        name: proc
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to monitoring/DaemonSet/node-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
    app.kubernetes.io/name: node-exporter
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-prometheus
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.2.2
  name: node-exporter
  namespace: monitoring
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
      app.kubernetes.io/name: node-exporter
      app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-prometheus
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: exporter
        app.kubernetes.io/name: node-exporter
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: kube-prometheus
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.2.2
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --web.listen-address=127.0.0.1:9100
        - --path.sysfs=/host/sys
        - --path.rootfs=/host/root
        - --no-collector.wifi
        - --no-collector.hwmon
        - --collector.filesystem.ignored-mount-points=^/(dev|proc|sys|var/lib/docker/.+|var/lib/kubelet/pods/.+)($|/)
        - --collector.netclass.ignored-devices=^(veth.*|[a-f0-9]{15})$
        - --collector.netdev.device-exclude=^(veth.*|[a-f0-9]{15})$
        image: quay.io/prometheus/node-exporter:v1.2.2
        name: node-exporter
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 180Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 102m
            memory: 180Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host/sys
          mountPropagation: HostToContainer
          name: sys
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /host/root
          mountPropagation: HostToContainer
          name: root
          readOnly: true
      - args:
        - --logtostderr
        - --secure-listen-address=[$(IP)]:9100
        - --tls-cipher-suites=TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_AES_256_GCM_SHA384,TLS_ECDHE_RSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305,TLS_ECDHE_ECDSA_WITH_CHACHA20_POLY1305
        - --upstream=http://127.0.0.1:9100/
        env:
        - name: IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: quay.io/brancz/kube-rbac-proxy:v0.11.0
        name: kube-rbac-proxy
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9100
          hostPort: 9100
          name: https
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 40Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          runAsGroup: 65532
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 65532
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      securityContext:
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 65534
      serviceAccountName: node-exporter
      tolerations:
      - operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
        name: sys
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: root

    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 10%!

##### FILE: node-exporter-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/DaemonSet/node-exporter:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: node-exporter
  name: node-exporter
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: node-exporter
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: node-exporter
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --web.listen-address=0.0.0.0:9100
        - --path.procfs=/host/proc
        - --path.sysfs=/host/sys
        image: quay.io/prometheus/node-exporter:v1.6.1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: node-exporter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9100
          hostPort: 9100
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 50Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 30Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /host/proc
          name: proc
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /host/sys
          name: sys
          readOnly: true
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      restartPolicy: Always
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /proc
          type: ""
        name: proc
      - hostPath:
          path: /sys
          type: ""
        name: sys

##### FILE: node-ingress1.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/backend-ingress:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/ssl-redirect: "false"
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex: "true"
  name: backend-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: backend.local
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: backend-service
            port:
              number: 3000
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

apiVersion: v1
data:
  install.sh: |
    #!/bin/bash

    # Setup Custom DNS
    rm -rf /etc/resolv.conf
    echo "nameserver 10.0.0.0" > /etc/resolv.conf
    chattr -f +i /etc/resolv.conf
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: node-init-config
  namespace: nodeutils

##### FILE: node-job.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Job/kube-bench-node:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  name: kube-bench-node
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - kube-bench
        - run
        - --targets
        - node
        image: docker.io/aquasec/kube-bench:latest
        name: kube-bench
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/etcd
          name: var-lib-etcd
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kubelet
          name: var-lib-kubelet
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kube-scheduler
          name: var-lib-kube-scheduler
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /var/lib/kube-controller-manager
          name: var-lib-kube-controller-manager
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/systemd
          name: etc-systemd
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /lib/systemd/
          name: lib-systemd
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /srv/kubernetes/
          name: srv-kubernetes
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/kubernetes
          name: etc-kubernetes
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /usr/local/mount-from-host/bin
          name: usr-bin
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/cni/net.d/
          name: etc-cni-netd
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /opt/cni/bin/
          name: opt-cni-bin
          readOnly: true
      hostPID: true
      restartPolicy: Never
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/etcd
        name: var-lib-etcd
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kubelet
        name: var-lib-kubelet
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kube-scheduler
        name: var-lib-kube-scheduler
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/lib/kube-controller-manager
        name: var-lib-kube-controller-manager
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/systemd
        name: etc-systemd
      - hostPath:
          path: /lib/systemd
        name: lib-systemd
      - hostPath:
          path: /srv/kubernetes
        name: srv-kubernetes
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/kubernetes
        name: etc-kubernetes
      - hostPath:
          path: /usr/bin
        name: usr-bin
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/cni/net.d/
        name: etc-cni-netd
      - hostPath:
          path: /opt/cni/bin/
        name: opt-cni-bin

---

##### FILE: node-local-dns_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/ConfigMap/node-local-dns:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  Corefile: |
    cluster.local:53 {
        errors
        cache {
                success 9984 30
                denial 9984 5
        }
        reload
        loop
        bind 0.0.0.0
        forward . __PILLAR__CLUSTER__DNS__ {
                force_tcp
        }
        prometheus :9253
        health
        }
    in-addr.arpa:53 {
        errors
        cache 30
        reload
        loop
        bind 0.0.0.0
        forward . __PILLAR__CLUSTER__DNS__ {
                force_tcp
        }
        prometheus :9253
        }
    ip6.arpa:53 {
        errors
        cache 30
        reload
        loop
        bind 0.0.0.0
        forward . __PILLAR__CLUSTER__DNS__ {
                force_tcp
        }
        prometheus :9253
        }
    .:53 {
        errors
        cache 30
        reload
        loop
        bind 0.0.0.0
        forward . __PILLAR__UPSTREAM__SERVERS__
        prometheus :9253
        }
kind: ConfigMap

kind: DaemonSet

      annotations:
        policy.cilium.io/no-track-port: "53"
        prometheus.io/port: "9253"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: node-local-dns
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -localip
        - 169.254.20.10,__PILLAR__DNS__SERVER__
        - -conf
        - /etc/Corefile
        - -upstreamsvc
        - kube-dns-upstream
        - -skipteardown=true
        - -setupinterface=false
        - -setupiptables=false
        image: registry.k8s.io/dns/k8s-dns-node-cache:1.15.16
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /health
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: node-cache
        ports:
        - containerPort: 53
          name: dns
          protocol: UDP
        - containerPort: 53
          name: dns-tcp
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 9253
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 25m
            memory: 5Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/coredns
          name: config-volume
        - mountPath: /etc/kube-dns
          name: kube-dns-config
      dnsPolicy: Default
      priorityClassName: system-node-critical
      serviceAccountName: node-local-dns
      tolerations:
      - key: CriticalAddonsOnly
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: kube-dns
          optional: true
        name: kube-dns-config
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: Corefile
            path: Corefile.base
          name: node-local-dns
        name: config-volume
  updateStrategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 10%!

##### FILE: node-netmanager.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to oakestra-system/DaemonSet/node-netmanager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: netmanager
  name: node-netmanager
  namespace: oakestra-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: netmanager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: netmanager
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - netmanager
        env:
        - name: NODE_PORT
          value: "50103"
        - name: MOSQUITTO_SVC_SERVICE_PORT
          value: "30033"
        - name: MOSQUITTO_SVC_SERVICE_HOST
          value: 10.100.254.89
        image: ghcr.io/oakestra/plugin-kubernetes/plugin-kubernetes/oakestra-nodenetmanager:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: node-netmanager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6000
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_ADMIN
            - NET_ADMIN
            - CAP_DAC_OVERRIDE
          privileged: true
          procMount: Default
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /
          name: host-more
      hostNetwork: true
      hostPID: true
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - cp /app/oakestra /opt/cni/bin/
        image: ghcr.io/oakestra/plugin-kubernetes/plugin-kubernetes/oakestra-cni:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: init-cni-bin
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/cni/bin
          name: cni-bin
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - cp /app/netmanager /root/bin/
        image: ghcr.io/jakobke/oakestra-net-manager-exec:1.0-amd
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: init-netmanager-bin
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /root
          name: netmanager-bin
      serviceAccountName: netmanager
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: host-more
      - hostPath:
          path: /opt/cni/bin
        name: cni-bin
      - hostPath:
          path: /
        name: netmanager-bin

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to oakestra-network/DaemonSet/node-netmanager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app: netmanager
  name: node-netmanager
  namespace: oakestra-network
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: netmanager
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: netmanager
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NODE_PORT
          value: "50103"
        - name: MOSQUITTO_SVC_SERVICE_PORT
          value: "30033"
        - name: MOSQUITTO_SVC_SERVICE_HOST
          value: 192.168.123.30
        - name: HOSTNAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        image: ghcr.io/jakobke/oakestra-net-manager:0.2-amd
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: node-netmanager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 6000
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - SYS_ADMIN
          privileged: true
          procMount: Default
          runAsUser: 0
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/run/netns
          name: host-netns
      hostPID: true
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - cp /app/oakestra /opt/cni/bin/
        image: ghcr.io/jakobke/oakestra-cni:0.1-amd
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: init-cni-bin
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/cni/bin
          name: cni-bin
      serviceAccountName: serviceaccount-oakestra-network
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/run/netns
        name: host-netns
      - hostPath:
          path: /opt/cni/bin
        name: cni-bin

##### FILE: no-deploy.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/no-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: no-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: nodename
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        run: nodename
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - arm64
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          protocol: TCP

---

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/DaemonSet/node-problem-detector-v0.1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    k8s-app: node-problem-detector
    kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
    version: v0.1
  name: node-problem-detector-v0.1
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      k8s-app: node-problem-detector
      kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
      version: v0.1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        k8s-app: node-problem-detector
        kubernetes.io/cluster-service: "true"
        version: v0.1
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: k8s.gcr.io/node-problem-detector:v0.1
        name: node-problem-detector
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 100Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 20Mi
        securityContext:
          privileged: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /log
          name: log
          readOnly: true
      hostNetwork: true
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /var/log/
        name: log

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nodered-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nodered
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nodered
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nodered/node-red:3.0.0
        name: nodered
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1880
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: nodered-storage
      volumes:

        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: nodered-pvc

##### FILE: node-service-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/node-service:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f docker-compose.yaml
    kompose.version: 1.33.0 (HEAD)
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: node-service
  name: node-service
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: node-service
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert -f docker-compose.yaml
        kompose.version: 1.33.0 (HEAD)
      labels:
        io.kompose.service: node-service
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: db
        - name: STRIPE_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: stripe_secret
              name: node-credentials
        - name: CHECKOUT_URL
          value: http://localhost:5000/
        - name: BROKER_KAFKA
          value: pkc-12576z.us-west2.gcp.confluent.cloud:9092
        - name: USERNAME_KAFKA
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: kafka_username
              name: node-credentials
        - name: PASSWORD_KAFKA
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: kafka_password
              name: node-credentials
        image: drew138/architecture-node-ambassador:v4
        name: node-service
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
          name: http-server
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 300Mi
      restartPolicy: Always

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/ingress-host:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  name: ingress-host
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: service1
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /bar
        pathType: Prefix
  - host: bar.foo.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: service2
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /foo
        pathType: Prefix

metadata:
  name: ingress-host
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: bar.foo.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: service1
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /bar
        pathType: Prefix
  - http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: service2
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /foo
        pathType: Prefix

---

1 - disallow-empty-ingress-host The Ingress host name must be defined, not empty.

kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    app: no-sa-token-pod
  name: no-sa-token-pod
  namespace: default
spec:
  automountServiceAccountToken: false
  containers:
  - command:
    - /bin/sh
    - -c
    - while :; do sleep 10; done
    image: ubuntu:22.04
    name: ubuntu
